Location: Mundial #Descriptión ``` This module allow create, update, delete and view profiles of user registered in your sistem. Language Spanish and English ``` #Install ``` 1.- Download. https://github.com/ulisesrodriguez/user.git" 2.- Download Codeigniter. http://ellislab.com/codeigniter 3.- Download extencion HMVC for codeigniter. https://github.com/Crypt/Codeigniter-HMVC 4.- Uncompress the file rar of codeigniter and copy to C:\\yourserver\www. 5.- Uncompress the file rar of extención HMVC and configure. 6.- Uncompress the file rar and copy the module in this folder application/modules/. 7.- Run the file application/modules/user/assets/sql/sql.sql in PHPMyAdmin 8.- GO URL http://youcodeigniterinstalation/user/view_list. ``` #Config ajax javascript ``` Open the file application/modules/user/assets/script/users.js set the var url with the url absolute the your codeigniter installation Example: http://localhost/codeigniter/ var url = ''; ``` #Config pagination ``` Open the file application/modules/user/controllers/user.php In Method public function view_list( $begin = 0 ) $config['per_page'] = 20; //This set the number of record for page ``` #Config language ``` Open the file application/modules/user/controllers/user.php Change the value of vars, for default the value is english if you want change to, set this to spanish // Languege public $language = 'english'; // Language Validator public $lang_validator = 'english'; ``` ### Authors and Contributors @ulisesrodriguez
